name: SMU with Modding
description:
SMU with modding

To load the mod go to Preferences and click "Load mod.zip" then find the mod you want to load. If nothing happens then it probably went well.


SizeMeUp-1.3.1_modding-0.2.0.zip:
SizeMeUp version 1.3.1 (a custom version, based on 1.2.2) implementing the 0.2.0 mod.json version

mod-0.2.0.zip
A mod, using the 0.2.0 mod.json version. Used to show you how the modding is supposed to work for a user.
